mapper.select: select no, title, welcome, profile, description from site where no=#{no}
select no, title, welcome, profile, description from site where no=1

choose.when: update site set title=#{title}, welcome=#{welcome}, description=#{description} where no=1
choose.otherwise: update site set title=#{title}, welcome=#{welcome}, profile=#{profile}, description=#{description} where no=1
